Package com.epam.esm.dao

Interface GiftCertificateDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GiftCertificateDaoImpl
    public interface GiftCertificateDao
    The interface for working with gift_certificate and gift_certificate_tag_connection tables in database.
